name: Food-o-Mad
description:
Weekly Jam 252 Submission: Weekly Game Jam - Week 252 - itch.io

Theme: Food

Sort of inspired by the intermittent fasting trend, 'One Meal a Day' or commonly abreviated to OMAD, where you eat within an "eating window" for weight loss and other benefits. If you are an avid OMAD fan, this was made just for fun and is in no way 100% factual nor was it meant to be. Thanks for playing this jam submission.  

See attached ReadMe.pdf for details on gameplay rules and food data.
